name: PacSun
description: Based on online research and 43 PacSun reviews, PacSun's overall score is 4.5 out of 5 stars. PacSun's review score is based on PacSun's customer ratings, its brand popularity, its price competitiveness, as well as the breadth and quality of features it offers to customers. The PacSun review table below incorporates summarizes 43 PacSun ratings on 50 features such as price point, fair trade certified and sustainable products. You can also compare PacSun against popular alternatives like ASOS, Old Navy and Gap. or you can view the top 50 brands in similar categories, such as fashion retailer stores, apparel brands and apparel brands.
about: PacSun is a large company operating the e-commerce site pacsun.com. PacSun sells its products and services in the fashion retailers industry. PacSun is a less active brand when it comes to discounting and offering coupons. PacSun has good ratings among shoppers on Knoji, with 43 ratings and an average rating of 3.4 stars. PacSun scores very well compared to other brands in the fashion retailers industry, providing 20 e-commerce features to better serve its customers.
review: PacSun (pacsun.com) is an extremely popular fashion retailer store which competes against other fashion retailer stores like ASOS, Old Navy, Gap, H&M and Uniqlo. Based on our in-depth PacSun review, when compared to its competitors, PacSun is a mid-range performing brand within its category. Read the full Pacsun.com review below for more details. Knoji has 43 PacSun reviews and ratings as of August 14, 2020. Knoji editors and the Knoji shopper community have reviewed PacSun and compared it against 0 top brands, reviewing PacSun based on product and store features such as eco-friendly, commitment to racial equity and . Knoji reviews and ranks Pacsun.com and other fashion retailer stores based on how many features each offers and based on a 5-star rating scale. Based on these factors and 43 PacSun reviews, PacSun earns an overall score of 4.5 out of 5.0 points. PacSun offers 8 total features such as PayPal, debit & prepaid cards and official coupons page. PacSun's's review score is also bolstered by the fact that it is a very popular brand with high brand recognition among consumers.
